title: NFT Gag Gifts: From Rugrats to Stoner Cats (and Trump Too)
description: Need a quick, memorable gift? These wacky—and infamous—NFTs are sure to make an impression this holiday season.

title: It’s a wonderful coin: Imagine a world without Bitcoin
description:
In a retelling of the Christmas classic movie, “It’s a Wonderful Life,” Cointelegraph takes readers into a timeline without Satoshi Nakamoto.

“I suppose it would have been better if I’d never been born at all,” said Satoshi, looking out into the snowy night. 

“What did you say?” said the angel investor, perking up his ears.

“I said I wish I’d never been born,” repeated Satoshi, “So many people hate me. Elizabeth Warren won’t stop introducing bills against me. The average person thinks I’m a scammer or a fraud.”

Read more

title: Is Solana's (SOL) Surge About to Hit a Wall? Why Experts Fear a Correction After an 870% Rally
description: Explore the compelling dynamics of Solana's (SOL) market performance as we dissect the contrasting indicators suggesting a potential correction following an astonishing 870% year-to-date surge. Amidst the buzz of a Santa Claus rally, this detailed analysis dives into the bullish and bearish scenarios, offering insights into the sustainability of SOL's growth and the looming concerns of market volatility. Discover what these trends could mean for Solana and its investors in the ever-evolving crypto landscape
